title: THE MOST UNIQUE NON-VERBAL HYPNOSIS TECHNIQUES / DR. PARET'S MASTERCLASS
description:
In our gaze there is a power. It is like there are inner forces in our gaze. Dr. Paret is the world foremost expert in the power of gaze fascination and mesmerism. In his teachings he completes the practice of what we call hypnosis. His practice goes far beyond the word. He integrates the hidden secrets of visual (gaze) and cinesthetic strategies and get deep hypnosis, strong crisis and faster results than with any other methods and with almost everybody. Learn the most powerful non-verbal hypnosis techniques in Dr. Marco Paret's school. You can also organize a course in your country or a VIP group for selected few with the participation of Dr. Paret.
Check our free course on www.mesmerism.info

Dr. Marco Paret is the world's leading authority in Non-Verbal Hypnotism.

Subscribe to our YouTube channel for more free lessons and useful techniques:
